DataElement.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory, Version 4 Complete Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to the completion of the PedsQL Generic Module

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory, Version 4 Complete
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A modular instrument for measuring health-related quality of life in children and adolescents ages 2 to 18. The PedsQL combines both generic core scales and disease-specific modules._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
